text:
I've been working with SpaceNet without a precomputed mask, then it computes the mask with a mask_stategy = 'epi', and I need 'background' instead.
But there is no parameter in the API to change it.

This is a minor change in the code, I wouldn't mind to do it if you guys think is useful.

@dohmatob, @GaelVaroquaux  

Best
title: SpaceNet should receive mask_strategy as parameter
clean_text: ive work spacenet without precomput mask comput mask maskstategi epi I need background instead but paramet api chang thi minor chang code I wouldnt mind guy think use dohmatob gaelvaroquaux best

title: SpaceNet should receive mask_strategy as parameter
